text: Daniel Kevin Fogler (born October 20, 1976) is an American actor, comedian and writer. In 2005, he won a Tony Award. He had roles in Balls of Fury, Good Luck Chuck, Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them, Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald, Kung Fu Panda, Horton Hears a Who!, Mars Needs Moms, and A Complete Unknown. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:Comedians from New York City
title: Dan Fogler
